# Vendor Bundles

This directory is reserved for offline third-party assets shipped with the extension, including TensorFlow.js runtime bundles and SheetJS distributions. Bundling assets locally keeps MarketPulseAI fully functional without external network calls.

Current bundled assets:

- TensorFlow.js ES2017 bundle (`tfjs.esm.min.js`, v4.22.0) for offline model inference.
